🛠️ Development Tools

Development Tools

Programming, databases, cloud services

🛠️ What are Development Tools?

Development Tools include core technologies needed for data engineering and software development. Through programming languages, database systems, and cloud services, we build efficient and scalable solutions.

🔍 Key Areas

💻

Programming Languages

Utilization of languages optimized for data processing and analysis like Python, Scala, and Java

🗄️

Databases

Various data storage systems including relational, NoSQL, and graph databases

☁️

Cloud Services

Cloud-based data services and infrastructure like AWS, GCP, and Azure

🔧

Development Environment

Tools and environments for efficient development including IDEs, version control, and CI/CD
